name: Soulace (Brametjuhh, TyrantNeptune, Endaviour, Puruun)
description:
"Step into the shoes of a humble Guide in the Purgatower. Will you be able to guide your last Soul and pass on to the Great Beyond?"

Soulace is a visual novel made by a group of 7 friends for the NaNoRenO 2021.

Soulace is a story about guiding souls to the afterlife, with a lighthearted undertone and some comedic aspects. The game features multiple endings, sprites, cgs, bgs and self-composed tracks.
